name: Wicked Skull
description: The Wicked Skull is a tiny monstrosity that resembles a common object when motionless, embodying a mischievous spirit.
memorable: Its ability to change shape and disguise itself as an object makes it challenging to detect.
goals: To influence encounters through trickery and charm.
relations: Commonly encountered with other trickster creatures or used by mischievous beings.
environment: Typically found in urban areas, near objects it can disguise itself as.
strengths: Highly skilled in deception, persuasion, and stealth, allowing it to manipulate others effectively.
weaknesses: Fragile with low physical attributes, particularly in strength.
attacks: Uses a Pseudopod melee attack to deliver bludgeoning damage and employs Petty Mockery to disrupt opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Shapechanger ability allows it to polymorph into a Tiny object at will, maintaining its statistics.
skills: Proficient in deception, insight, persuasion, and stealth, enhancing its trickster capabilities.
additional_information: Advantage on Charisma checks when incorporating humor.
Indistinguishable from an ordinary object when motionless.
test_queries: tiny trickster creature that can disguise itself
creature with advantage on deception checks
small monster that uses humor in combat
deceptive creature that resembles an object
